title: Alibaba Researcher Spotted Global Software Flaw, but Beijing Complains of Reporting Delay
sub_head: China pauses partnership with Alibaba Cloud for what ministry calls untimely reporting of Log4j2 issue
body:
SINGAPORE—In late November, an Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. researcher found and alerted an open-source software foundation about a global software vulnerability that is now troubling governments and companies world-wide.
This week, the company found itself in hot water in China for what officials said was its failure to report the Log4j2 software flaw to Beijing in a timely fashion. The Chinese ministry in charge of technology suspended a cybersecurity partnership with Alibaba’s cloud-computing unit over the matter, Chinese state media reported.
